Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Requires the appointment of impartial hearing officers in New York City school districts
Summary: Requires the appointment of impartial hearing officers in New York City school districts for appeals procedures for children with handicapping conditions.
LawCode: Amd ยง4404, Ed L; add ยง1049-c, NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to impartial hearings in school districts in cities with a population of one million or more
